templateOptions.label: ApiKey
templateOptions.description: The ApiKey to connector to Caci Osiris. ApiKeys are generated within the application.

templateOptions.label: SchoolName
templateOptions.description: The name of the school for which the data will be fetched

templateOptions.label: Limit
templateOptions.description: The limit of students that will be fetched from Caci Osiris and imported in HelloID

templateOptions.label: BatchSize
templateOptions.description: The rate limit used to fetch the data. Set this to a max value of 50

templateOptions.label: Toggle debug logging
templateOptions.description: When toggled, debug logging will be displayed
